Uses of Class
org.s2doglm.matrix.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    org.s2doglm.matrix  
    org.s2doglm.vector  

    • Uses of Matrix in org.s2doglm.matrix

      Methods in org.s2doglm.matrix that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix Matrix.dilationMatrix(float X, float Y, float SX, float SY)
      Dilation matrix relative to (X, Y).

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.dilationMatrix(1.0f, 10.0f, 2.0f, 3.0f);

      static Matrix Matrix.oDilationMatrix(float SX, float SY)
      Dilation matrix relative to Origin(0, 0).

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.oDilationMatrix(2.0f, 3.0f);

      static Matrix Matrix.oRotationMatrix(float ang)
      Rotation matrix relative to Origin(0, 0).

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.oRotationMatrix((float) Math.toRadians(90));

      static Matrix Matrix.rotationMatrix(float X, float Y, float ang)
      Rotation matrix relative to (X, Y).

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.rotationMatrix(1.0f, 10.0f, (float) Math.toRadians(90));

      static Matrix Matrix.simpleOrtho(float l, float t, float r, float b)
      Simple orthogonal matrix which doesn't interfere with Z axis.

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.simpleOrtho(0, 0, 600, 800);

      static Matrix Matrix.translationMatrix(float X, float Y)
      Translation matrix.

      Example of use:
      Matrix mat = Matrix.translationMatrix(5.0f, 10.0f);

      Methods in org.s2doglm.matrix with parameters of type Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Matrix.transform(Matrix matT)
      Used to transform the current vector by multiplying a transformation matrix with the current vector itself.
      Example: if it is A.transform(B); Then it is matrix B * A.

    • Uses of Matrix in org.s2doglm.vector

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Vec4.transform(Matrix mat)
      Used to transform the current vector by multiplying a transformation matrix with the current vector itself.
